mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element Encounter

Documentation:

A description of an interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • EncounterOrEpisode
        • Encounter
Used By:
  • CareContext

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      EncounterClass

      Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

      1..1

      List of past encounter statuses

      An indication of the importance of an action relative to other actions.

      EpisodeOfCare

      An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur. The managing organization assumes a level of responsibility for the patient during this time.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(EpisodeOfCare)
      0..*

      A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time.

      The explanation or justification for the current item or action, as a code. Reason is a string or CodeableConcept in DSTU2 but in later versions only a CodeableConcept.

      PartOf

      The larger entity that the asserted item is a portion of. For example, an organization part of a larger organization, or an encounter with a hospitalist might be part of a larger hospitalization encounter.
